page.title: 03 Employment.
page.content:
Employment provided by area-mainly farm workers.2 small general stores and 1 hair dresser(family buisness).1 Dr private practice.2 pubs.Edgeview host- pital-9 staff.2 part time residents in our D block & 3 part time cooks & domestics. Residents in Kinver-5 find employment in Kinver.Generally a movement outwards to B'ham & Black-co untry to find work. Brierley Hill) Dudley ) 18 Warley ) Kingswinford ) B'ham ) 16 Sandwell) Stourbridge ) 10
Kidderminster) 4 Wolverhamton) 7
Bridgnorth ) 1 Worcester )1
Travelling ) 2 Other )4
